name: merezhyvo
description: Minimal Chromium-based browser for Ubuntu Touch built with Electron and React.
author: Naz.R

scripts.clean: rimraf dist dist-electron app-bin app build
scripts.build:static: mkdirp dist && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && rm -rf dist/resources && cp -R resources dist
scripts.build:electron: esbuild electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts electron/mode.ts --bundle --external:x11 --outdir=dist-electron --platform=node --target=node18 --format=cjs --log-level=info --external:electron && esbuild electron/context-menu.ts --bundle --outfile=dist-electron/context-menu.js --platform=node --target=node18 --format=cjs --log-level=info --external:electron
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron
scripts.start: npm run build && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.start:fs: npm run build && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron dist-electron/main.js --fullscreen
scripts.start:wayland: npm run build && OZONE_PLATFORM=wayland XCURSOR_SIZE=14 env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron dist-electron/main.js --fullscreen
scripts.start:mobile: npm run build && MZV_MODE=mobile OZONE_PLATFORM=wayland XCURSOR_SIZE=24 env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron --disable-gpu --no-sandbox dist-electron/main.js
scripts.start:desktop: npm run build && MZV_MODE=desktop env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron --disable-gpu --no-sandbox dist-electron/main.js
scripts.start:devtools: npm run build && MZV_MODE=desktop env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron --disable-gpu --no-sandbox dist-electron/main.js --devtools
scripts.start:mob-devtools: npm run build && MZV_MODE=mobile OZONE_PLATFORM=wayland XCURSOR_SIZE=24 env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron --disable-gpu --no-sandbox dist-electron/main.js --devtools
scripts.package:electron: npm run build && npx electron-packager . merezhyvo --platform=linux --arch=arm64 --out=app-bin --overwrite --asar --icon=merezhyvo_256.png
scripts.package: npm run package:electron && npm run stage
scripts.click:build: clickable clean || true && clickable build --arch arm64 --accept-review-errors
scripts.click:make: npm run package && npm run click:build
scripts.click:install: adb push build/*.click /home/phablet/Downloads/ && adb shell 'click install --allow-untrusted /home/phablet/Downloads/*.click'
scripts.prepack: npm run licenses:json && npm run licenses:generate
